definition: a threatened or attempted physical attack by someone who appears to be able to cause bodily harm if not stopped, to attack in speech or writing
details:
noun
- a threatened or attempted physical attack by someone who appears to be able to cause bodily harm if not stopped
- the crime of forcing a woman to submit to sexual intercourse against her will
= synonyms: violation
- close fighting during the culmination of a military attack
verb
- to attack in speech or writing
= example: to attack in speech or writing
= synonyms: snipe
- to attack someone physically or emotionally
= example: to attack someone physically or emotionally
= synonyms: attack
- to force someone to have sex against their will
= example: to force someone to have sex against their will
= synonyms: outrage
